content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal extraction point at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x2)

### Iron plate factory at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position x3)
- Inserter (position x4) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position x5) that connects the furnace at position x1 to the assembling machine at position x3

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required items in your inventory before attempting to craft. For example, you need 2 iron-plates to craft 1 iron-gear-wheel.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.
